services

Individual Theraphy

At CPS, our personal philosophy is that through human connection, we can foster the encouragement needed to take courageous steps toward seeing an old pattern through a new perspective to create positive change. Our highly qualified clinicians believe in the inherent wisdom of each individual, and embody an attitude of respect and acceptance of oneâ€™s self-image and world-view, allowing for the creation of a safe, therapeutic container. Therapy thus serves as a road map, illuminating the path so that conscious choices can be made.
